H0.text: According to Greek legend, who was the wife of Odysseus. Helen

H1.text: According to Greek legend, who was the wife of Odysseus. Andromache

H2.text: According to Greek legend, who was the wife of Odysseus. Ariadne

H3.text: According to Greek legend, who was the wife of Odysseus. PENELOPE

A4.text: Penelope finally accepts that he truly is her husband, a moment that highlights their homophrosýnē ('like-mindedness')
